scripts.smoke:admin: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $ports=@(3000,3001,3002,5173); $frontend=$null; foreach($p in $ports){ $u=('http://127.0.0.1:'+$p+'/'); try { (Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $u -UseBasicParsing -TimeoutSec 5) | Out-Null; $frontend=$u; break } catch {} }; if(-not $frontend){ throw 'Frontend not reachable on ports 3000/3001/3002/5173. Start: cd frontend; npm run dev' }; $backend='http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/health/'; try { (Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $backend -UseBasicParsing -TimeoutSec 5) | Out-Null } catch { throw 'Backend not reachable at http://127.0.0.1:8000. Start: python manage.py runserver 127.0.0.1:8000' }; $env:PW_BASE_URL=$frontend.TrimEnd('/'); $env:PW_API_BASE='http://127.0.0.1:8000/api'; npx playwright test admin-smoke admin-crud --project=chromium --timeout=60000"
